TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Maypwan, title = Maypwan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maypwan} }

S.FORM: Maypwan kyan bbnasan, khu pila ru tikuy pklahang hayan. thuyay ta musa mbaziy bbnasan ye'aya. blay ta musa khu pila smku pila, magan pila ru smatu tegami. atuni mhayan ta ga, blay ta musa kuysang ptayux hayan. kwara kinbalay knxan yuwaw na misu soni hani ga, pthuyay musa blay kinyanux ta.

Maypwan kyan bbnasan, kho pila ro tikoy pklahang hayan. thoyay ta mosa mbaziy bbnasan ye'aya. blay ta mosa kho pila smko pila, magan pila ro smato tegami. atoni mhayan ta ga, blay ta mosa koysang ptayox hayan. kwara kinbalay knxan yowaw na miso soni hani ga, pthoyay mosa blay kinyanox ta.
